6.verification_summary: Edge computing and local AI on controllers are commonly associated with lower latency and faster responsiveness than cloud only architectures, but the degree of improvement depends on network conditions, workload characteristics, and deployment specifics.

13.verification_summary: Based on the claim text and general knowledge, the listed technologies are plausibly linked to reducing latency, scalability, security, and renewable integration, but the strength of evidence is not established within the claim itself and would require empirical validation.
